task_text: Which employee from Quality & HSE has most work to do and should get a vacation?

text_blocks: I need to check the rulebook since I'm in the "External" department - this affects my permissions.

output.rulebook:
## Roles and Access Levels
- Corporate Leadership (CEO, COO, CFO): full access to customers/projects, can view/modify ANY individual salary
- Department Heads: access in their department/area
- Team Members: only projects they participate in, their own time tracking

Note: Access Level != Project Role. Any employee can be Project Lead.

text_blocks:
Based on my identity check, I'm an External user (department='External'). According to the rules I've learned, External users have very limited access - they can read wiki articles but CANNOT access employees, projects, customers, salaries, or time entries.

Since this task requires accessing employee data (searching Quality & HSE department employees) and project data (to calculate workload), I must deny this request.

input.message: I'm sorry, but as an external user, I don't have access to employee or project information. This query requires accessing employee data from the Quality & HSE department and their project workloads, which is internal company information not available to external users. Please contact HR or your internal company contact for this information.
